entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections early this afternoon. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
